title: Learn Spanish: The Alphabet and Verb "Ser"
headline: In this free online course, you will learn the basics of Spanish, from the verb “ser” to greetings and short phrases.
description: This free online Spanish course will help beginners learn one of the world's most spoken languages. Over 500 million people worldwide, in over 20 countries, speak Spanish. This entry-level Spanish course contains modules on the alphabet, everyday verbs, and helpful vocabulary to initiate everyday conversations. By the end of this course, you will be able to talk about your job, greet new people, and introduce yourself in Spanish.
courseDescription:
This free online Spanish course for beginners has three parts: pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary. First, you will learn the alphabet and common and proper nouns. This part of the course includes audio files by native speakers to help you pronounce each letter correctly. You will also learn to correctly pronounce a unique letter in the Spanish alphabet, the letter Ñ.

Once you know how to pronounce the alphabet correctly, you will learn about articles and the verb “ser,” the most common verb in Spanish. In this section of the course, you will also learn about nouns, pronouns, and jobs. Understand the difference between feminine and masculine nouns and how to use the gender articles correctly, as they are very important in Spanish. The last part of the course will teach you essential vocabulary for greeting people, such as “hola” and “¿cómo estás?” By the end of the course, you will be able to have a short conversation with a Spanish speaker.

This beginner-level Spanish course is perfect for students with no Spanish knowledge or anyone wanting to review the basics. We have designed this course to include many audio examples from native speakers to help you learn. There are questions in each topic as well as the end 'Course Assessment' section to review your progress.   Enroll today and start speaking Spanish.
